main event: A silvery object was observed in Alameda, California for about 5 minutes and then faded from view.
interesting points: The object was round and silver in color,It showed no signs of propulsion and made no sound,It hovered motionless before shooting off at tremendous speed,Observers included two highly respectable citizens of the area,The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes in a different instance with a similarly described object.
witness description: highly respectable citizens of Alameda, California
